statements: DELETE FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_name = 'Safety Training' AND completion_date = '2022-04-15';
DELETE FROM employee_training_programs WHERE employee_id = 101 AND program_name = 'Sales Training';
DELETE FROM employee_training_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND competency_area = 'Leadership' AND training_hours > 20;
DELETE FROM employee_training_programs WHERE program_name = 'Onboarding Program';
DELETE FROM ProgramEnrollments WHERE program_id = 5 AND employee_id = 200;
DELETE FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE employee_id = 101 AND skill_name = 'SQL'
DELETE FROM Employees WHERE department = 'IT' AND hire_date < '2021-01-01'
DELETE FROM EmployeeTraining WHERE employee_id = 101 AND program_id = 201;
DELETE FROM EmployeeSkills WHERE skill_id = 301 AND employee_id = 102;
